patthana24.10:1.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:1.1_1: Naahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:1.1_2: Nasahetukaṁ nahetuñca naahetukaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:1.1_3: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana24.10:2.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.10:3.1_0: Naahetukaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.10:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana24.10:4.1_0: Nahetusampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetusampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.10:5.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca. (Sahetukadukasadisaṁ.)
patthana24.10:6.1_0: Nahetuñceva naahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:7.1_0: Naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:8.1_0: Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:9.1_0: Nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:9.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Antimadukaṁ na labbhati.)
